name: Fair and Square and Bear: A Watering Can Adventure
name_original: Fair and Square and Bear: A Watering Can Adventure
description:
Hi I made a game press left and right to move Bear to collect 3 watering cans to take care of Flower. Since you are a bear you cannot jump but you can press Up Key at a tree to climb. Keep your distance from campers or you pay a hefty price of restarting your daring adventure!

I made the Bear, wood, tents, and weird cloud platform sprites. The ground is from Free Platform Game Assets and most images come from free clip art. Music used is Moonlight Sonata by Beethoven and Nature Sounds Forest.
